sentence.Network_en: The snowy street, like the church, assumed a dumb, lifeless aspect.
sentence.Network_cn: 积雪覆盖的街道就像教堂一样，显得沉闷、毫无生气。

sentence.Network_en: We strode across the snowy fields.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们大步流星地穿过雪封的旷野。

sentence.Network_en: It was a dead - cold snowy afternoon with no signs of life outside.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是一个寒冷的下午,天还下着雪,外面一个人也没有.

entry.tran: 积雪覆盖的;大雪纷飞的
entry.def: A snowy place is covered in snow. A snowy day is a day when a lot of snow has fallen.

example.ex: ...the snowy peaks of the Bighorn Mountains.
example.tran: 比格霍恩山白雪皑皑的群峰

means.word_mean: 多雪的, 下雪的, 积雪的

sentences.en: The weather has been very snowy recently.
They often stood sentry on snowy nights.
It was a dead-cold snowy afternoon with no signs of life outside.
sentences.cn: 那是一个寒冷的下午, 天还下着雪, 外面一个人也没有。

sentences.en: Do you think your car will stand up well under such snowy conditions?
sentences.cn: 你认为你的车在积雪的条件下还能耐用吗?

sentences.en: The old man combed his snowy hair.
